text: Aleksandar Yovchev (; born 27 October 1996) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a defender for Spartak Varna. ==Career== In January 2014, Yovchev was included in Cherno More's 25-man squad for their training camp in Turkey. Aleksandar made his first team début in a 2–2 away draw against Slavia (Bulgarian Cup 1/8 final) on 3 December 2014. He made his full league début in a 1–2 home defeat against Lokomotiv Plovdiv on 26 May 2015, playing as left back. On 17 January 2018 Yovchev returned his hometown to play for Spartak Varna."Спартак 1918" започна подготовка с 13 нови футболисти ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=2|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan=2|Cherno More |2014–15 |1||0||1||0||—||—||2||0 |- !| Total !1!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0 |- | rowspan=2|Dobrudzha Dobrich |2015–16 |15||1||1||0||—||—||16||1 |- !| Total !15!!1!!1!!0!!0!!0!!16!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:PFC Cherno More Varna players Category:PFC Dobrudzha Dobrich players Category:PFC Spartak Varna players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players
